attributes.action: review the current situation with regards to tuition fees such that all students are treated equally
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there is an unfair and apparently discriminatory distribution of who pays tuition fees for university and who is exempt. for example, welsh students studying in wales gain a reduction whereas scottich students pay no tuition fees at all. english students pay regardless of the location of their studies. we request that either tuition fees all abolished for all students or that all students pay the same amount regardless of where they are domiciled
